name: UpdateAddressRequirement
description:
Update an existing Address Requirement object.

This service is using the ID or a PropertyType-CountryID par as input for the finding of the
correct address requirement we want to update.
If the address requirement is found the visibility and validation of this will be updated.
auth_description: Requires a user of type `Employee` or `Api` with functionality `Addresses:Edit`

headers.name: EVA-User-Agent
headers.description: The user agent that is making these calls. Don't make this specific per device/browser but per application. This should be of the form: `MyFirstUserAgent/1.0.0`

headers.name: EVA-Requested-OrganizationUnitID
headers.description: The ID of the organization unit to run this request in.

headers.name: EVA-Requested-OrganizationUnit-Query
headers.description: The query that selects the organization unit to run this request in.

B.name: CountryID
B.description:
This is the ID of a `Country`

This string must be between 2 (incl) and 2 (incl) characters long.

B.name: ID
B.description: This is the ID of a `AddressRequirement`

B.name: MaxLength
B.description: Providing a `null` value and not providing the property at all has different meanings.

B.name: MinLength
B.description: Providing a `null` value and not providing the property at all has different meanings.

B.name: PredefinedValues
B.description: Providing a `null` value and not providing the property at all has different meanings.

B.name: PropertyType
B.description:
Possible values:

* `1` - FirstName
* `2` - LastName
* `3` - Address1
* `4` - Address2
* `6` - HouseNumber
* `7` - ZipCode
* `8` - Subdistrict
* `9` - District
* `10` - City
* `11` - State
* `12` - CountryID
* `13` - EmailAddress
* `14` - PhoneNumber
* `15` - CountrySubdivisionID
* `16` - Remark

B.name: Validation
B.description: Providing a `null` value and not providing the property at all has different meanings.

D.name: Code
D.description: A unique ID identifying this error.

D.name: Message
D.description: A human-readable message describing the error.

D.name: RequestID
D.description: A unique ID identifying the request. Please provide this ID when contacting support.

D.name: Type
D.description: A short description of the error type.

E.name: ExternalIDs
E.description: When using the `ExternalIDs` mode, this will hold the resolved external IDs.

E.name: IsAsyncResultAvailable
E.description: This is a flag indicating whether the async request is done. If it is `null`, it is not an async service. If it is `false`, the response is not yet available. Do not process the properties in that case. It is is `true` the properties are filled with the result of the call.

E.name: UnresolvedExternalIDs
E.description: When using the `ExternalIDs` mode, this will hold the external IDs we couldn't resolve.
